text: nazzal ealayk alquran bialhaqi aldhy la rayb fyh, msddiqana lima qablih min kutub wrsl, wa'anzal altawrat ealaa musaa elbh alslam, wal'iinjil ealaa eisaa ealayh alslam min qibal nuzul alqran; l'irshad almutaqin 'iilaa al'iyman, wslah dinahum wdnyahm, wa'anzal ma yufraq bayn alhaqu walbatl. waladhin kafaruu biayat allah almnzlt, lahum eadhab ezym. wallah eaziz la yughalab, dhu antiqam biman jhd hjjh wadlth, wtfrrudh balalwhyt
